title: University of Chicago
overview: The University of Chicago offers a merit-based scholarship providing full funding to outstanding international students pursuing undergraduate degrees. This opportunity covers tuition, living expenses, and other associated costs.
requirements: Must be enrolled in a relevant academic program
Minimum GPA of 3.5 on a 4.0 scale

university.name: University of Chicago
university.about: Founded in 1890, the University of Chicago is known for rigorous academics, distinguished faculty, and a strong commitment to innovation.

testimonials.name: Rachel Brown
testimonials.quote: An excellent opportunity with comprehensive support for international students.

testimonials.name: Emma Wilson
testimonials.quote: Great financial support, though the application process was quite competitive.

title: Oxford Global Scholars
overview: Oxford Global Scholars supports master's students who demonstrate financial need and academic excellence. Recipients receive tuition coverage and research stipends.

university.name: University of Oxford
university.about: Established in the 12th century, Oxford is renowned for its tutorial system and world-leading research output.

testimonials.name: Isabella Chen
testimonials.quote: The mentorship and funding opened doors to global research collaborations.
